content: 2 b pattern drawn as a graph medium tentacle 4 5mm hook tc make 9 chain 67 66 + 1 row 1 start in the 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet in every 66 stitch ch1 and turn row 2 single_crochet 2sc x 33 fasten_off 99 a medium tentacles make 9 b pattern drawn as a graph large tentacle 4 5mm hook single_crochet make 8 chain 67 66 + 1 row 1 start in the 2nd chain from the 66 hook single_crochet in every stitch row 2 single_crochet single_crochet 2sc x 22 ch1 and turn 88 row 3-5 repeat the pattern single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet 2sc 110 - 137 - 171 until the end of the row ch1 and turn a medium tentacles b pattern drawn as a graph make 8 assembly now all that is left is to attach the tentacles to the hat hold the hat such that the inside is facing towards you and attach the tentacles just above the inner brim using safety pins or stitch markers see pictures below then using a darning needle and a strand of yarn stitch each tentacle to the hat use a yarn the same color as mc for stitching so that nothing shows on the outside of the hat and as a final tip go slowly and be careful not to catch another tentacle or one of the loops from the brim decoration with your stitches voilà
